snippet: The case focuses on whether FedEx had appropriate safeguards to prevent online pharmacies from shipping drugs without prescriptions.
abstract: FedEx is indicted in connection with long-running Justice Department investigation into illegal pharmaceutical shipments; case focuses on whether FedEx had appropriate safeguards to prevent online pharmacies from shipping drugs without prescriptions.
lead_paragraph: The case focuses on whether FedEx had appropriate safeguards to prevent online pharmacies from shipping drugs without prescriptions.

headline.main: Justice Department Indicts FedEx in a Drug-Shipping Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Justice Department Indicts FedEx in a Drug-Shipping Inquiry
